item.title: UpSet Charts Comparison
item.description: Motivation For the May 26 2020 R4DS Tidy Tuesday data set, I explored UpSet charts, which simplify visualizing overlap of large numbers of sets. Laura Ellis has a useful explanation of how Venn and Euler diagrams become unwieldy for intersections of greater than two sets. I analyzed which ingredients, as well as combination of ingredients, are most common in U.S. cocktail drinks. Source The cocktail ingredients data is originally from the Mr.
